lines:
18 April, 1999

kr. S. Go Lak,

South Byfield, Nass.

Dear Sir

Mr. Stears is away for several days end therefore cannot reply pront -
ly to your letter of the 15th. He will return either the first or the middle of next 
week, and will doubtless send to you at the t tiare the money for vich you ask a 
check came from China a day or two ago, thien I think was applies to your gesamt -
Very truly yet

Secretary to the Principal
raw: 18 April, 1999 kr. S. Go Lak, South Byfield, Nass. Dear Sir Mr. Stears is away for several days end therefore cannot reply prontly to your letter of the 15th. He will return either the first or the middle of next week, and will doubtless send to you at the t tiare the money for vich you ask a check came from China a day or two ago, thien I think was applies to your gesamtVery truly yet Secretary to the Principal

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter stating that Stearns is away and cannot reply to the letter of April 15th. The latest check has been received and Stearns will send the money requested upon his return.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
